basics.name: Zach Guthrie
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a software engineer, passionate problem solver, and empathic human being. I have been a consultant for 5+ years with a wide breadth of experience across many different tech stacks, incorporating aspects outside of code such as Cloud technologies, DevOps, and GenAI. I have a proven track record of excellent product delivery in both individual and team settings, and as both a contributor and team leader. I take pride in my work and love collaborating with other like-minded people, both technical and non-technical.

work.name: Slalom Build
highlights: Lead a team of 5-6 global developers across PST/EST/GMT/IST time zones through creation of a high-visibility client-internal web application
Guided business leaders through an agile transformation that generated noticeable impact on how the business approached project management
Worked in conjunction with other team leads to handle rapidly shifting business requirements and generate effective architectural solutions with very little turnaround
Implemented proof-of-concept solutions utilizing burgeoning GenAI technology
Established standardized GenAI practices for consultants and educated peers about pros and cons of using GenAI in practice
work.summary: Managed and ran larger-scale engineering efforts

work.name: Slalom
highlights: Engaged directly with business stakeholders to ideate on conceptual ideas for coding solutions
Architected Cloud-driven solutions that prioritized client needs without sacrificing scalability, security, and reliability
Identified inefficiencies and issues in existing client systems and proposed tangible solutions and fixes that saved clients money without requiring a complete overhaul
Lead multiple small teams (2-3 SE consultants) to create complete solutions for clients in time-sensitive, shifting environemnts
Educated client engineers on continuing to iterate on solutions, prioritizing understanding of the inner workings and how to troubleshoot issues that may arise
work.summary: Worked as a developer on multiple client-facing projects. Team sizes ranged from individual contributor roles to small pods (3-6 developers).

work.name: Slalom
highlights: Created multiple Cloud-based applications that could stream, transform, and manipulate mass quantities of data
Designed front-end applications with a focus on improving workflows and accessibility for client users that became critical to business practices for years to come
Spearheaded the creation of functional CI/CD patterns that were utilized on current and future client engagements
Handled successful transition of mutiple engagements to client engineering teams through knowledge transfer sessions and comprehensive documentation
work.summary: Worked as a developer on multiple client-facing projects. Team sizes ranged from individual contributor roles to small pods (3-6 developers). Delivered quality software products under very short time constraints and shifting business priorities.

work.name: Georgia Tech Research Institute
highlights: Created a comprehensive suite of 80+ automated Selenium WebDriver tests
Converted multiple factories/directives to components as part of modernization effort for AngularJS web application
Mentored other interns/co-ops in automated testing strategies and development
work.summary: Hired initially as an SDET to help with expanding automated testing efforts across multiple applications. Expanded to a full-stack engineering position aiding with large scale conversion across AngularJS versions while still maintaining test suite responsibilities.
